DOC.brief_summary: The aim study identify incidence hepatitis B virus reactivation rate Diffuse Large B Cell high grade Follicular lymphoma patient prior resolve hepatitis B undergoing RCHOP immuno-chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Incidence Hepatitis B Virus ( HBV ) Reactivation HBsAg Negative/HBcAb Positive Lymphoma Patients Treated With RCHOP
DOC.criteria: Naive DLBCL high grade FL patient Age range 1875 year old ECOG performance status 03 Life expectancy 3 month Adequate organ function HBsAg negative/HBcAb positive baseline Infection HAV , HCV , HIV Pregnant lactate woman Serious uncontrolled disease
